results.content:
The course is nice for beginners.
The video is a good overview of drupal 8.
The title succinctly captures the video.
Great job Zane.
results.content_html:
The course is nice for beginners.
The video is a good overview of drupal 8.
The title succinctly captures the video.
Great job Zane.

results.content:
I came to this course as a next step after learning HTML and CSS, and having researched CMS knowing that Drupul was the route I wanted to take first rather than Wordpress due to the extensive module support and customisation . 

I particularly found it very helpful going through the architecture of Drupul and the relationship between themes, blocks, views and content; and getting an idea of what aspects to style with Bootstrap in Drupal and what is better done in your own style sheet.

Fun course!
results.content_html:

Fun course!

results.content: I learnt some good things but felt that not all concepts were explained
results.content_html: I learnt some good things but felt that not all concepts were explained

results.content: Despite the slow start it's a good primer to Drupal theming. I personally expected a little bit more detail but hopefully he will follow up with a deep dive course.
results.content_html: Despite the slow start it's a good primer to Drupal theming. I personally expected a little bit more detail but hopefully he will follow up with a deep dive course.

results.content: Great introduction to Drupal 8 site building and theming with Bootstrap 4. Terrific explanations in a step by step format. Great value! Zane's instruction is clear and within the context of a real project. Would love an advanced theming course from this instructor!
results.content_html: Great introduction to Drupal 8 site building and theming with Bootstrap 4. Terrific explanations in a step by step format. Great value! Zane's instruction is clear and within the context of a real project. Would love an advanced theming course from this instructor!

results.content: Bypasses all the fluff and gets to the real world application. Badass!
results.content_html: Bypasses all the fluff and gets to the real world application. Badass!

results.content:
This course taught me an aweful lot! Thank you for providing this.
Sometimes, things got rushed and then the spoken text went too quick (the wind-back is worn out by now :-)). Sometimes a little more background information about WHY and BECAUSE could help.
Great performance and pace!
results.content_html:

results.content: Thank you so much mr Zane! I am living in Turkey. I like your tutorials. I am both learning English languge and Drupal :) Thank's for useful tutorials. 5 starts :)

results.content: It's a very useful course for me, but I was hoped the course had some more advanced details, and that what I looked for it in this course .

results.content: Very basic adoption of bootstrap 4 theme. Not recommended if you want to build a theme from scratch.
